# DeviceActivityData.Device

**Structure**

A device for which to report activity data.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Device
```

## Instance Properties

- **model**: The model of the device.
- **name**: The name of the device set by the user.

## Enumerations

- **DeviceActivityData.Device.Model**

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable

items.description: The name of the device set by the user.
items.name: name
